name: Pierre
title: Pierre Bezukhov
description: The illegitimate son of Count Bezukhov. A freethinking, sometimes reckless, man capable of decisive action and great displays of willpower when circumstances demand it.

name: Natasha
title: Natasha Rostova
description: The lively and irrepressible daughter of the Rostov family, who charms everyone she meets.

name: Andrei
title: Prince Andrei Nikolayevich Bolkonsky
description: The intelligent, disciplined, and ambitious son of the retired military commander Prince Bolkonski. Coldly analytical and resistant to flights of emotion.

name: Nikolai
title: Nikolai Rostov
description: The impetuous, eldest Rostov son, who joins the Russian forces in 1805 and spends much of the novel on the warfront.

name: Sonya
title: Sonya
description: The humble cousin of Natasha and Nikolai, who lives with the Rostovs as a ward. Deeply in love her childhood sweetheart, Nikolai.

name: Helene
title: Helene Kuragina
description: Vasili Kuragin’s cold, imperious, and beautiful daughter, who seduces Pierre into marriage and carries out many affairs.

name: Marya
title: Princess Marya Bolkonskaya
description: The lonely, plain, and long-suffering daughter of Prince Bolkonski, Marya endures her father's cruel treatment with Christian forgiveness.

name: Anatole
title: Anatole Kuragin
description: Vasili Kuragin's son, a handsome, irresponsible and somewhat hedonistic military officer.

name: Napoleon
title: Napoleon Bonaparte
description: A French military and political leader who rose to prominence during the French Revolution and invaded Russia.
